Project.title: Project
Project.description: Represents a project showcased on the portfolio.

category.description: Category of the project (e.g., Web Design, Branding).

description.description: A detailed description of the project.

year.description: The year the project was completed.

client.description: Name of the client the project was created for.

imageUrl.description: URL of the project's thumbnail/poster image.

media.description: An array of images and videos for the project gallery.

ClientLogo.title: ClientLogo
ClientLogo.description: Represents a client logo to be displayed in the carousel.

Author.title: Author
Author.description: Represents the author of the portfolio.

roles_admin.title: Admin Role
roles_admin.description: Represents an admin user role. The existence of a document with the user's UID as ID in this collection grants admin privileges.

isAdmin.description: Should always be true. The value doesn't matter, only existence.

/projects/{projectId}.description: Stores project data. All projects are publicly readable. Administrative write access is managed through the /roles_admin/{uid} collection.

/client_logos/{clientLogoId}.description: Stores client logo data. All client logos are publicly readable. Administrative write access is managed through the /roles_admin/{uid} collection.

/author/{authorId}.description: Stores author data. All author data is publicly readable. Administrative write access is managed through the /roles_admin/{uid} collection.

/roles_admin/{uid}.description: Collection to store UIDs of administrative users. Existence of a document indicates admin privileges. This facilitates secure write operations to other collections.
